summary: Comprehensive testing of new color distribution feature completed successfully. All required functionality working correctly including multi-select color toggles, automatic first color assignment, matrix validation, and save functionality. Minor issue with tallas loading resolved by re-saving record.

ui_bugs.issue: Initial tallas loading issue - dialog shows 'Este registro no tiene tallas definidas' even when record has tallas
ui_bugs.workaround: Re-saving the record resolves the issue

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: Color selection buttons display in toggle style (Negro, Azul, Verde)
First color selection assigns full quantity automatically (10, 15, 10 for TEST-001)
Matrix displays with tallas as columns (30, 32, Test-34) and colors as rows
Matrix validation prevents sum exceeding talla totals
Row totals (color totals) calculated and displayed correctly
Column totals (talla assigned vs total) displayed in 'Asignado' row
TEST-001 record has 3 tallas with 35 total pieces as expected
Saved data persists and loads correctly when dialog reopened
Multi-color selection and distribution works properly
Toggle button visual feedback (selected state with ring-2 class)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix tallas loading issue in color distribution dialog - the dialog initially shows 'Este registro no tiene tallas definidas' even when the record has tallas defined. This requires investigation of how colorEditItem.tallas is populated when opening the dialog.
